title: 224: BachNation News: Matt’s Contestant Leaving for Tyler? + Dylan Scared of ABC? + Hannah Contacting Jed?
itunes:title: 224: BachNation News: Matt’s Contestant Leaving for Tyler? + Dylan Scared of ABC? + Hannah Contacting Jed?
description:
The Broads are reunited and need to chat some Bachelor tea! First they discuss Bekah’s opinions about Monday’s episode, Matt dropping hints about one of his contestants falling for Tyler next week, Matt and Tyler’s apartment horror photo, Dylan coming for ABC on Twitter, Jed promising tea then disappearing, Ben HIggin’s book, and more! 


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***FRAMEBRIDGE: Go to Framebridge.com and use promo code CHATTY to save an additional 15% off your first order!

***HELLO FRESH:Go to HelloFresh.com/10chatty and use code 10chatty for 10 free meals including free shipping!

***ADAM & EVE: Enter code CHATTY at checkout to get 50% off your item + 10 tantalizing FREE gifts!

***STAMPS.COM:Get a 4 week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale at Stamps.com - click on the Microphone at the TOP of the homepage and type in CHATTY
